articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: Dow tumbles more than 700 points as inflation and tariff fears mount - CNN
articles.description: US stock markets fell sharply Friday after an economic report showed American consumers are growing increasingly fearful of price increases and how President Donald Trump’s tariffs could reignite the inflation crisis.
